title: Interpretation of opening the door in a dream Seeing the door open in a dream

preview.html: The dream of opening a door indicates the appearance of changes and the end of problems, and other interpretations that we will interpret for single, married, pregnant, divorced and divorced men, just as I opened an iron or a wooden door and dreamed that I opened the door of the house without a key and opened the door to a stranger and saw the closed door. Whoever sees the dead person opens the door to his house, according to Ibn Sirin and others in continuation. Subject: Interpretation of a dream about opening a door: Doors symbolize in dreams everything that is new and the changes that can occur in a person’s life and memories from time to time. Seeing the opening of a door in a dream is a clear expression of overcoming adversity and horrors. It is also a sign of the disappearance of fear of the future, and opening the door indicates victory, victory, and success. It may also indicate profit. Opening a door in a dream interpretation can indicate knowledge or learning in the sense that the person who sees it in his dream is similar to the dreamer. Opening a door with a key is intertwined with knowledge and success, and based on this interpretation, a dream of travel or wealth comes true if the dreamer seeks one of them. It means opening doors in a dream to many things. The goodness that will flow to the dreamer in real life, bringing him great blessings and profits. Opening the door wide and wide in a dream indicates the good reputation that the dreamer and his family enjoys in real life, as well as good morals and ethics. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is opening the door then He saw another small door in the middle of it, then this is an indication of misfortunes and problems that may arise in the coming period for the dreamer or for one of his relatives. In the event that a person dreams during his sleep that the doors he sees in front of him are always open and there are no closures on them, then this indicates the just and stable wife to whom the dreamer is attached. Whoever dreams during sleep that he opens the door and enters through it, this indicates the victory and profit that he will achieve. On his opponents in real life, whether at work or in social life. Whoever sees in a dream that the doors in front of him are wide open and he does not know them, this indicates the new opportunities that are presented to him in practical life and the new stages that he is going through in his life. In the event that he sees The dreamer, while sleeping, sees that the door in front of him opens directly into the street, this is an indication of the loss of some friends who had bad intentions. Whoever dreams that the door opens in front of him at home, this is a sign of the cohesion of his family and that those with bad intentions will not enter its members. Hearing a knock on the door means that you You receive new news, and it has also been said that knocking on the door symbolizes commitment to the dream of being single. But if you dream that you are knocking on the door forcefully, this is a sign of determination to achieve something that is always associated with success. Opening doors in a dream are signs of kindness and success. Whoever sees in his dream an open door and is about to take an exam, he will be successfully sewn. Whoever sees in his dream an open door and is about to Marriage gains the approval of the bride’s family and blesses his marriage. For a single woman who hopes to communicate with a generous person in a dream, seeing a door

Whoever sees in his dream an open door and is about to get married will receive the approval of the bride’s family and bless his marriage. title: Interpretation of a dream about talking to a Jew in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about talking to a Jew in a dream If you are looking for what was said about the interpretation of a dream about talking to a Jew in a dream, in the following lines we learn many interpretations, not specific jurisprudence.Interpretation of a dream about talking with a Jew in a dreamInterpretation of a dream that we are talking with a Jew in a dream can To be a sign of committing sins and transgressions, and God knows the unseen. When you see the dreamer talking with a Jew for a long time in a friendly manner, it may lead him to commit sins, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. It can also indicate immoral behavior and God knows the unseen, as it may indicate the necessity of repentance for committing Sins and disobedience, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about a Jew trying to kill me in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about a Jew trying to kill me in a dream. We did not find any specific concepts to consider this, but seeing the Jews fighting could be a sign of victory over the enemies, and God knows best. In the event that the dreamer sees the Jews fighting, this may mean that he will be able to defeat his enemies, and God knows the unseen. But if the dreamer sees the Jews victorious over him, it may indicate The victory of the enemies over the dreamer, and God knows best. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a Jewish woman in a dream. Interpretation of the dream of seeing a Jewish woman in a dream could be an indication of the world that tempts the man, and God knows best. Seeing a Jewish woman in a dream could be evidence of rebellion, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees the Jewish woman In a dream, this may express that he will face a problem, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. When a married man sees a Jewish woman in a dream, this may indicate anxiety and sorrow, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a Jew in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about marrying a Jew in a dream could be a sign of trouble. And God knows the unseen. If the dreamer sees marrying a Jew in a dream, this may be evidence that he has committed bad deeds, and God knows the unseen. Seeing a wedding with a Jew in a dream could be evidence of problems. It may also indicate the fall of rulings, and God knows the unseen. Interpretation of a dream about a Jewish funeral. In a dream: Interpretation of a dream about a Jewish funeral in a dream. We did not find clear explanations for seeing this. However, seeing a funeral in a church may indicate moving away from religion, and God knows the unseen, as it may express the dreamer’s warning to return to religious teachings, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. In the event that the dreamer sees a funeral in a church, this may indicate a departure from the teachings of religion and God. I know the unseen. The interpretation of a dream about a Muslim entering a church in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about a Muslim entering a church in a dream may represent a funeral, and God knows the unseen. Just as a vision of a Muslim entering a church may indicate death, and God knows best. If a married woman is seen entering the church and hears the bells ringing, this may indicate the presence of a problem, and God is Most High. And I know the interpretation of a dream about joy in the church in a dream. The interpretation of a dream about joy in the church In a dream, the presence of joy in the church can indicate religion and morals, and God knows what is not seen. When a single girl sees a happy presence in the church, this can indicate the success of the marriage.

When you see buying a set of glasses in a dream, it may be a good beginning, and God knows best. If the dreamer sees himself buying a set of Glasses, this may lead to happiness, God willing. It can also indicate comfort and stability, God willing. Interpretation of dreams: I buy bread in a dream. Interpretation of a dream: I buy bread in a dream, it could be a sign of nutrition, and God knows best. If a married woman sees herself buying bread in a dream, it may represent that Nutrition with pregnancy, and God knows the unseen. The vision of buying bread can also represent kindness and money, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about guava in detail

preview.html: Giving guava in a dream Guava indicates estrangement between families. Guava indicates that you must get close to your family if there is estrangement between you, especially since it contains thorns, because thorns have all negative interpretations and the cause of estrangement could be women. Seeing guava in a dream indicates ease Life, and the ease of eating guava indicates the ease of survival, and the difficulty of eating guava due to the presence of hard seeds in it indicates the difficulty of earning a living, but the fortuneteller who will find it after that. A little patience and wisdom, and guava can indicate drought or dehydration. As part of its name. Interpretation of seeing guava in a dream: Seeing guava in a dream can indicate a good person and the smell is associated with the smell of guava. Guava can indicate a lack of interest and interest. Seeing green guava in a dream means solving old problems and conflicts in life and alleviating worries. Guava in a dream shows the dreamer’s success In his life and the kindness he receives. Yellow guava indicates worries, debts, and problems that may bother the fortuneteller. Eating white guava in a dream indicates a change in circumstances for the better, comfort, calm, and the removal of problems. Eating spoiled guava in a dream indicates that the dreamer talks and chats a lot and betrays some of those close to him in his life. It indicates A guava tree in a dream indicates progress in life, success, and an abundance of goodness that the dreamer will obtain. If one sees himself picking guava fruit from the tree, this is evidence of a calm and happy life. Eating and eating fresh guava in a dream indicates that anxiety and relief will disappear after distress. Seeing a guava tree with many fruits Guava denotes sustenance with a large number of children and good offspring or money and a lot of sustenance from where it does not matter. Seeing a green guava in a dream can be a sign that a person has good morals and is wise and makes the right decisions in difficult times. Whoever sees that another person He gives him green guava fruit, as this indicates that he and this person will have a good relationship, strong friendship, trust, and mutual benefit. As for yellow guava, it can indicate a serious illness or following a forbidden diet. Guava in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates ease and conduct of childbirth and success in pregnancy, and that the newborn It will be healthy if the guava is white and has a good smell and taste, and it also indicates its safety. If you see yourself buying guava in a dream, this indicates immediate comfort, removing fears, changing circumstances for the good and accelerating good things for the pioneer, and guava can be in the dream A sign of haste in making decisions. He saw in a dream that he is drinking guava juice, it is a sign of good behavior, ease of things, almost comfort, justice, leaving tension and distress, and obtaining easy sustenance. Seeing colored guava in a dream means kindness, nourishment, and conflict resolution. It indicates Ripe guava in a dream indicates a lot of good and surprising food and brotherhood

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing iron in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing iron in a dream through the interpretation books of Imam al-Sadiq, Ibn Sirin, al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or Ibn Kathir. For modern scholars of vision and dream interpretation, iron is one of the oldest metals discovered, and it is an important and necessary mineral element in human life as well, and it is used in many industries, and God Almighty said: “We sent down iron therein with great hope and benefits for people.” But the presence of iron in a dream has different meanings for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a man as well. On the Fekra website, we will explain it in detail in this article. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin said that iron in a dream is a symbol of greatness, strength and abundance of money. Whoever dreams of eating Hadi and chewing it in his dreams is a sign of gossip. As for whoever dreams of melting iron in a dream, this is evidence of his disrespect for him. Seeing that you have iron in a dream symbolizes many livelihoods. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq Imam Al-Sadiq tells us that seeing iron in a dream shows the dreamer's ability to endure the hardships and difficulties that stand in the way of his life. If the dreamer sees that he is making iron in a dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer is trying to use illegal ways to earn money. If the dreamer sees that he is eating iron in a dream, this may be a sign of difficulty in life or difficulties at work. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream for a single woman The single girl who dreamed of iron in her dream symbolizes the strength of her personality and her reliance on herself without others. Seeing molten iron is a sign of a girl's passion. Anyone who thinks that she is holding an iron in her hand is a sign of her confidence in what she does. Anyone She saw herself setting fire to the new programs that she will get married soon. As for the girl’s opinion that she has become an iron worker, which suggests recovery from illness. It also indicates work to earn a living. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream for a married woman A married woman, when she dreams of buying iron in a dream, shows her many good morals. If you dream of buying iron with the aim of building a new house, this is an indication that you will move to a new, spacious and beautiful house. Seeing iron rust in a dream is a symbol of forbidden or corrupt money. Dreaming of seeing her house built of iron only is a sign of the stability of her marital life and the continuation of her home full of joy and love. Seeing a hand holding her hand is a good omen for a great inheritance that may be inherited. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream for a pregnant woman Iron in a pregnant woman’s dream is better. Whoever sees iron coming out of his mouth is a sign of a male child. But if the iron is in her hand, it shows ample food for the newborn. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream for a man A man who sees himself eating iron in a dream is a sign of difficulty and difficulty of work. Whoever dreams that a lot of iron comes out of his mouth indicates that the problems are gone. As for He sees himself chasing the Iron Man or fighting with him, this indicates the strength of the dreamer in facing problems and crises.
preview.text: Interpretation of the dream of seeing iron in a dream through the books of interpretation of Imam Al-Sadiq, Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, Ibn Shaheen, or Ibn Kathir. For visionaries and dream interpretation scholars in the modern era, iron is considered one of the oldest metals that have been discovered, and it is an important and necessary metal element in human life as well, and it is used in many industries, and God Almighty said: We sent down iron therein with great desperation and benefits for people.” But the presence of iron in a dream has different meanings for a single woman, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a man as well. On the Fikra website, we will explain it in detail in this article. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin said that iron in a dream is a symbol of greatness, power, and abundance of money. Whoever dreams of eating Hadi and chewing it in his dreams is a sign of gossip. As for whoever dreams of smelting iron in a dream, this is evidence of... His lack of respect for him. Seeing that you have iron in a dream symbolizes many livelihoods. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream according to Imam Al-SadiqImam Al-Sadiq tells us that seeing iron in a dream shows the dreamer’s ability to bear the hardships and difficulties that stand in the way of his life. If the dreamer sees that he is making... Iron in a dream, this vision indicates that the dreamer’s attempt to use are illegal ways to make money. If the dreamer sees that he is eating iron in the dream, this may be a sign of difficulty in life or difficulties at work. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream for a single woman, a lonely girl The one who dreamed of iron in her dream symbolizes the strength of her character and her reliance on herself alone. Seeing molten iron is a sign of the girl’s passion. Anyone who thinks that she is holding the iron in her hand is a sign of her confidence in what she is doing. Anyone who sees herself setting fire to new programs is that She will get married soon. As for the girl’s opinion that she has become an iron worker, this suggests recovery from illness. It also indicates working to earn a living. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream for a married woman: A married woman, when she dreams of buying iron in a dream, many good morals appear to her. If you Dreaming of buying iron with the aim of building a new home, this is an indication that you will move to a new, spacious and beautiful home. Seeing iron rust in a dream is a symbol of forbidden or corrupt money. Dreaming of seeing her home built of iron only is a sign of the stability of her married life and the continuation of her home, which is full of joy and love. Seeing a hand holding hers is a good omen for a great inheritance that may be inherited. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream for a pregnant woman. Iron in a pregnant woman’s dream is better. Whoever sees iron coming out of his mouth, it is a sign of a boy. But if the iron is in her hand, it shows ample nourishment for the newborn. Interpretation of seeing iron in a dream for a man: A man who sees himself eating iron in a dream is a sign of the difficulty and difficulty of work. Whoever dreams that a lot of iron comes out of his mouth indicates that the problems have passed. As for whoever sees himself chasing the iron man or fighting with him, this indicates strength. The dreamer faces problems and crises.

title: Interpretation of the road in a dream or losing the road in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a road, path, or street for a single girl, a married woman, a pregnant woman, a divorced woman, a married or a single man, whether it is long, dark, narrow, narrow, or wide open. Ibn Sirin, Imam Al-Sadiq, Al-Nabulsi, and others. Interpretation of the road in a dream. Seeing the street or road in a dream for her. Many different interpretations are determined by the shape of the road, as its interpretation is linked to a number of other details in the dream, as described by the dreamer. Seeing the road in a dream indicates that the person will soon reach his goals or it may also indicate a long journey until the desired goals are achieved, while if If the road is not straight, i.e. crooked or curved, then this indicates the occurrence of problems and difficulties in future life. In a dream, it indicates Sharia law, and different paths are heresies, so whoever sees that he is walking in a different way is mistaken in his religion. If the Sultan takes a complicated path, his justice is spread in that place. The straight path is evidence of what is followed by the Book of God and the Sunnah of His Prophets, and if one disobeys it, he repents, and if he disbelieves, he is guided. Different paths indicate disagreement, confusion, and similar paths that lead to misguidance, heresy, and disbelief. The method is the path in construction. The path to the sea is salvation from distress, possessions, legal profit, or the trust with which a man is saved if he follows it. The hidden path is falsehood and heresy. As for the people of the mountain, cunning and deception appear in the dream. Dawn on the mountain is evidence of survival from hardships or journeys; God Almighty says: Interpretation of seeing the road in a dream: Dreaming of crossing a dark, black road means that the person is going through a difficult stage in his life and is plagued by feelings of fear, anxiety, tension, and depression. Whoever dreams that he is walking on a straight path, this indicates his disobedience and repentance to God. And whoever sees in his dream that the road ends This indicates the cessation of nourishment, sadness, worry, and worry. And whoever sees that he is walking with his feet on a narrow or uneven road, this indicates the emergence of dangers, problems, and disagreements in his personal or professional life. Interpretation of the long road in a dream. Dream interpretation scholars have interpreted that the long road in a dream indicates patience. Resistance to life's difficulties and problems, longevity and effort to achieve desired goals, or a long road may indicate achievements at work, whether it is a year of school or two universities. Interpretation of a dead end in a dream: Seeing a dead end in a dream indicates the need for the dreamer to be patient and persevere to overcome all the obstacles that arise. He may face it or expose the dreamer to a temporary psychological state in his future life. Interpretation of a highway in a dream: Whoever dreams that he is driving a fast-style car, this indicates one’s success in trade and abundance of profit and livelihood. If he dreams that he is driving a car race on a highway, then this indicates good luck for everyone around him and his superiority over them. Interpretation of the dark road in a dream: Whoever sees in a dream that he is driving on a dark road at night, this indicates a dark heart, bad morals, and work that is contrary to good morals, and the stars indicate On a lot of etc

title: Interpretation of the dream of seeing a fox in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam Al-Sadiq

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a fox in a man’s and a woman’s dream. The fox is a predatory animal and is characterized by deceit and cunning. Therefore, seeing it in a dream raises some concern, as some see it as uncommon, and although the fox belongs to the dog family, it is not like it and is not classified as a pet, and it is considered one of the most difficult animals around it because it has an innocent face but carries cunning and cunning behind it, and the fox is a social animal that lives in groups and it is not better to stay alone. We will learn through our article the details of the interpretation of the dream of the fox for men and women as explained by Ibn Sirin and Al-Nabulsi. Interpretation of a dream about a fox by Ibn Sirin The fox in a dream symbolizes the presence of a harmful person in the dreamer's life. The fox is evidence of a treacherous conspirator. The fox in a dream indicates the need to think about choosing decisions before making them. Escaping from a fox in a dream shows the positive things that will happen in the dreamer's life. Interpretation of a dream about a fox in a dream by Imam Al-Sadiq The fox indicates an enemy or a traitor. A bite from a fox or a scratch indicates a disaster or disaster for the visionary. Chasing a fox or running after the visionary indicates the presence of bad friends in the dreamer's life who must beware of them and can cause serious damage. Escaping from a fox means surviving danger, kindness and survival. The fox attack indicates To disasters and disasters such as financial losses in work or trade, or there may be problems and conflicts in the family environment that lead to competition and alienation. Interpretation of a dream about a fox for a single woman Seeing a fox attacking a chicken is evidence of some disloyal friends in this girl's life. Seeing a flock of foxes in a dream means that she is a girl who does not trust those around her. The fox in a girl's dream is evidence that a person is proposing to her, but she is not suitable. Interpretation of a dream about a fox for a married woman A fox in a married dream dreams of deception and deception. Follow the fox to dream of someone watching your life. The presence of a fox in a dark place is evidence of independence. Attacking a fox in a dream indicates the presence of enemies in your life that you did not know. Strangling a fox in a dream means that you are dealing with a bad person. Running a fox in a dream is a sign of unfortunate matters. Interpretation of a dream about a fox for a pregnant woman A pregnant fox in a dream is evidence of an imminent birth. The fox in a pregnant woman's dream can be a sign of good and abundant survival. The fox in a pregnant woman's vision is evidence of the presence of a male child. The white fox is evidence of the presence of a girl. The fox is a sign of good luck. Interpretation of a dream about a fox for a man A fox in a man’s dream is evidence of a fraud and a conspirator in his life. Escaping from a fox in a dream is a sign of positive things that will happen in the dreamer’s life. The fox in a dream is a sign of losing money. The fox in a man’s dream is evidence that someone in his life is plotting against him. Escaping from a fox in a dream A fox attack indicates bad and sad news. A fox attack indicates harming and harming an evil person. A fox attack and escaping from it indicates a very good condition, livelihood, and improvement in living conditions. The person who

title: Interpretation of funeral prayer in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: In the following article, we explain to you what is the interpretation of the funeral prayer in a dream for an unmarried, married, and pregnant girl, according to what was stated in the book Interpretation of Dreams by the jurist Muhammad ibn Sirin. To ask God Almighty to forgive the dead and have mercy on him, and one of the most common dreams is to see the performance of this prayer in a dream, so the sleeper is afraid of this vision and wants to know what it symbolizes and what it symbolizes. Dream interpretation scholars say that this dream varies depending on the social status of the fortuneteller, and we will explain through the following encyclopedia paragraphs the interpretation of the dream in detail, so follow us.Interpretation of funeral prayer in a dreamInterpretation of funeral prayer in a dream by Ibn SirinThe great scholar Muhammad ibn Sirin says: If the sleeper sees in his dream that he is going To a funeral, this vision indicates that he is following a corrupt ruler. And if the fortuneteller sees in his dream that he is praying the funeral and carrying the coffin, then this is a good vision that portends him a long life, and this vision also carries good connotations, such as the appearance of abundant and blessed sustenance in the life of God. The jurist Ibn You will see that attending a funeral prayer in a dream means meeting friends and forming new relationships. Interpretation of a funeral prayer in one dreamDream interpretation scholars say that seeing a funeral prayer in an unmarried girl’s dream is a dream worthy of praise, indicating that she will obtain a prominent position in society. If she sees If an unmarried girl dreams that she is praying at the funeral of a dead person, this is a sign that she will meet friends who will always help her succeed. Seeing a funeral prayer in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates that her wedding is approaching. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is crying during the funeral prayer, This is an unpleasant vision and indicates the difficult period that the dreamer is going through, and it also indicates the deterioration of her psychological state. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is praying at the funeral of a martyr, this is a good vision and its connotations are good, and it warns the dreamer of the death of worries, getting rid of problems, and his arrival. One of the happy events in her life. Interpretation of a dream about funeral prayer for a married woman. If a married woman sees in her dream a funeral prayer for a dead person she knows, this is a sign that problems will come to her life. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is praying at the funeral of a martyr, this is a good vision that portends her pregnancy in the future. The near future and the arrival of goodness and blessed nourishment in her home. Seeing the funeral prayer for an already dead person in a married woman’s dream is good news that she will get what she wants. Dream interpretation scholars say that seeing the funeral prayer in a married woman’s dream indicates the presence of many marital disputes that may lead to To separation from her husband. If a married woman sees in her dream that she is praying at her husband’s funeral, this indicates that there are some problems in her home, but God will help her get rid of them. Interpretation of funeral prayer in a dream for a pregnant woman. Dream interpretation scholars say that if a pregnant woman sees in a dream that she is praying For a funeral, this is a sign of her suffering during pregnancy. This vision may indicate the emergence of some disagreements that are disturbing the dreamer

title: Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child from the left breast by senior imams

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child from the left breast. The interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child from the left breast varies depending on the dreamer’s condition and social status, which indicates the woman’s tenderness and affection towards the child, and also indicates the kindness of his heart and good intentions. Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a child from the left breast for one womanDream interpreters explained that The interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a child from the left breast varies depending on the dreamer’s condition. If an unmarried woman dreams that she is breastfeeding a girl from her left breast, this portends great good for her, and much better than seeing a man breastfeeding. But if she sees in her dream that she is breastfeeding a male child from her left breast, This is a sign of the anxiety and pain that she will suffer in the coming period. This vision shows the tenderness of her nature and her intense desire to become a mother due to her tenderness and kindness. Psychologists believe that if she sees that she is breastfeeding a child from her left breast, this means that she lacks emotion and needs Interest in her life. Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a child from the left breast of a married woman. The great interpreters agreed that the left breast is on the side of the heart. If a married woman dreams that she is breastfeeding her child from her left breast, this is a sign of the intensity of her tenderness and kindness of her heart. Seeing a child breastfeeding from the left breast in a married woman’s dream means that all the family problems she suffered from will be removed and resolved and she will live a happy life without any worries. This vision also shows that Almighty God will give her a child with the same qualities as the child she saw in her dream. If it is a boy, she will give birth. A boy, and if a girl gives birth to a girl. If a woman suffers from an illness in reality and sees this vision, this indicates that she will be cured of all diseases and will enjoy health and well-being again. If an old married woman who has passed the age of childbearing sees that she is breastfeeding a child from her left breast, this means That she heard good and happy news about her children, for example her daughter’s marriage or her son’s success. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child from the left breast for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is breastfeeding a child from her left breast, this means that the date of birth is approaching and that her child will be healthy. Seeing breastfeeding in a pregnant woman’s dream is evidence of kindness, blues, and comfort after hardship and legitimate money that will come to her in the coming days. If she sees that she is breastfeeding a baby girl during the first months of pregnancy, this means that the child she will give birth to will be of high rank and authority and will have a great status in the future. And it will be the reason for that. The happiness of his parents. Interpretation of dreams about breastfeeding a child from the left breast of a divorced woman and a widow. If a divorced woman sees in her dream that she is breastfeeding a child from her left breast while it is full of milk, this means that she will obtain all her rights without deficiency. If a widow sees in a dream that she is breastfeeding a child, this indicates problems And the difficulties that she endures and the feeling of restrictions and loss of freedom. Seeing a child being breastfed from the left breast in a widow’s dream indicates her extreme sadness and heartache due to the death of her husband and her full responsibility. Interpretation of a dream about breastfeeding a child from a man’s left breast if
